website_summaries.verdict: The brand's top seller has top notes of grapefruit and citrus with layers of bergamot and Hawaiian wedding flower.
pros: This scent has many long-time users who feel that it does what the name suggests, and lifts the spirit
With bottom notes of honeysuckle, it has a long-lasting, fresh and feminine aroma
cons: Too much of a citrus tone for some tastes

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this perfume in December when my other one was getting low. I started using this last week and thought it smelled funny. I figured it was just my smeller. But then I sprayed some on a clean cloth. It is Not Happy. I don’t know if it was a bad batch or if someone was selling fake perfume. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Watered down knockoff
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Clinique Happy since high school — 20+ years. This is NOT genuine. It is close to the right scent, but it’s very likely watered down, imo. I had to spray this on HEAVILY and it definitely didn’t last all day. Not even close. With my other Happy I’ve purchased from department stores or the Clinique website, 2 pumps and it lasts all day. And I’ve always gotten compliments on how good I smell, but not once did I hear a single compliment while wearing this particular bottle. Don’t go the cheap route by buying this knockoff. It’s not the real deal. It’s worth the extra money to buy the genuine Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this fragrance for many years and know the difference between quality perfume and perfume that is not. It looks like water and when I sprayed it on, it smells like rubbing alcohol and water. Please dont waste your money like I did This item isn't eligible for return
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Should have paid more attention to the other reviews. Weak in scent and it does not last long. I have worn Clinique Happy for well over 20 years, and I have never had this issue. Amazon. You are scamming your customers. Don't order this. Pay a little extra and get something that will last. I purchase 2 bottles. I have opened one and have used some of it. The other bottle will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: ShellMann

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fake .. it's not the real happy perfume by Clinique !!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real deal. I have a real happy perfume &this bottle..its NOT the same scent, nor does it last on skin AT ALL! It sucks. Smells like strong alcohol &VERY little scent that goes away in minutes. I think Amazon employees are making their own knock offs. Things are deceiving. This is not what I paid for, its NOT the Happy perfume Clinique makes. I should be refunded!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not ( HAPPY ) at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this perfume for my wife as a gift, but sad to say she was not very( HAPPY ). The fragrance is so weak that you could hardly smell it and it doesn't last. I think we got ripped off with this perfume, it has to be a knock off. Amazon you better change suppliers. and I think we deserve a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this fragrance for 15 years. I have purchased twice from Amazon with no problems. But... I have to say that this is NOT CLINIQUE HAPPY. There is no SMELL!! Amazon shame on you for substituting something else. NOT HAPPY! SAVE YOUR MONEY!!! DO NOT BUY!!! THIS ITEM CAN NOT BE RETURNED!!! IT'S A SCAM!!!
customer_reviews.author: MiMi Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, citrus notes
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got me this perfume for our first ever Valentine's day, long ago in 2003. He wanted to smell it on me again so he bought me this and it's brought us both way back to the "old days". For those wondering, it is authentic. For those who may not know, Happy has a very dominant citrus note. Great for summertime! Also a very large bottle, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wife’s Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells Good for an awesome price! Usually pay $40.00ish for a small bottle at the drug store behind the locked case! Mrs.Werner here, ladies try the pillow test. When u wake up in the morning spray a couple squirts of Happy on your pillow while making your bed.....then when it is bed time smell your pillow. That is how u figure out for sure the perfume you received is the real deal. Mine smells strong at first, then fades. I was second guessing the product until I tried it out my self. Smells so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: william werner

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottle almost a sample
customer_reviews.text: I scan the barcode on the side and I found out that this was supposed to come in a set that you were not supposed to sell separately the package is clearly marked not for sale but they decided to sell it anyways and it's overpriced for this tiny bottle and I mean tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Menshek

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean fragrance, like orange flowers, and it really make you feel happy! Mood enhancer, and makes people around you to smile more at you and feel calm. It is not a sensual smell, rather it is a positive, clean, energizing, "pick you up" type of smell. Good for working in an office and retail. You will feel like smiling all day! Not overwelming fragrance, it is rather delicious and adds on your natural PH, I recommend it to people that might suffer from the "blues".
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Happy! (But not this version)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased Happy from Amazon and it smells a bit “off” again for some reason. Came in brand new, unopened box; seemed legit...? But still smells weird. Customer service was made aware of this the first time around and I got a refund, which is great, but here I am again with the same issue. Otherwise, I ADORE Happy and get compliments whenever I wear it! Oh well...guess I’ll have to find it again on Amazon, but buy from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lillidid

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This in NOT Happy by Clinique...which I have worn for a very long time I saw this product here, and thought I’d pick one up to save time and a bit of money Totally disappointed in the product and Amazon. Your customers trust you to deliver as advertised...I will never purchase fragrances from this venue ever again Do not purchase, you’ll be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: i hate it
customer_reviews.text: i like fragrance on the sweet side. this is far far from it. to me, it stinks. it smells cheap when it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnsi

customer_reviews.title: Smells Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my girlfriend and she hated it. She has supposedly bought this brand of product before, but this one smells like straight vodka. I returned the item but never received a refund. This product smells so bad I wouldn't gift it to my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This scent is not for me...or for anyone for that matter
customer_reviews.text: Nastiest smelling perfume I’ve ever smelled in my life. I gave it to my daughter and then had to throw it away because I couldn’t handle smelling it on her. This is headache inducing, not pleasant, overly sweet perfume. I gave 2 stars because shipping was fast and I liked the size of the bottle but man that’s some nasty stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: RebaReed

customer_reviews.title: Favorite scent great deal prices
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume since I was in high School and I always try to keep some around but I know I use it too much but the summery orange smell is my always my go to scent
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell as strong as previous
customer_reviews.text: Does not smell like the original . Not very strong at all. I had a sample size from scentbird and this was way stronger with way less spray. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Smells sour - Not the same as from dept store!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t smell the same as it does when you buy it from Clinique directly. The scent is very similar, but has a hint of... Hard to explain - but almost moldy smell. Like sour, like if you’ve left your clothes in the washer too long. Moral of the story, it doesn’t smell legit and was pretty much a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena sanders

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. My wife has been wearing Clinique Happy for over 7 years and this is the real an authentic product. I was a bit skeptical with such a good price but it came and it smells great and I know it is an authentic Clinique product. I would recommend this scent. It is a great light smelling perfume that works for people even with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: T Will

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Scent, Old Perfume, Cap doesn't attach and was rolling around in package!
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly disappointing. I think they sent me a very old bottle because it's a ghastly yellow color and smells horrible. I literally sprayed it on my wrist and recoiled at the smell. The cap will not even stay on the bottle! I've tried this perfume before, so I know that I normally like it, and I wanted a travel-sized version for my purse. Please don't waste your money on this very sad product.
customer_reviews.author: KSA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. If it’s to good to be true, then something is wrong. Great price, but doesn’t smell the same at all. Doesn’t have the staying power and will be gone completely after a few hours. Bottle has a different font and is made in Switzerland and not the US like all of the other Happy perfume that I’ve purchased. Very disappointed and can’t return. Good lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Ann Silvas

customer_reviews.title: bright and citrus-y
customer_reviews.text: A citrusy scent that does lift your spirits. I ordered it because I broke my bottle while clearing out a bathroom shelf. My bathroom floor smelled lovely for about a week! And now I have the scent for myself again! Yes, you can still pick it up at Clinique counters. It was easier for me to order.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay P.

customer_reviews.title: I have spritzed my closet and my clothes still smell like it 2 weeks later
customer_reviews.text: I have always wore this fragrance and its the exact same smell at the one from the department stores. I think its authentic. there is no indication it is not. I have spritzed my closet and my clothes still smell like it 2 weeks later. I'm pretty honest and was skeptical to buying from the neg reviews, but this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: S Manzagol

customer_reviews.title: Not the Happy I'm used to
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving this new bottle of Happy, I have noticed that it has an strong alcohol, almost rancid scent. I ordered another bottle that arrived today. After comparing the two, my suspicions were right. The new bottle smells like the Happy I have been using for years. Unfortunately, it appears that I am unable to return the first bottle that I purchased in April.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E.

customer_reviews.title: sweet citrus. Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Its very cheerful young aroma, sweet citrus. Not bad. Too sweet for me and too primitive one though. I like fresh and cold tunes of citrus, the smell of luxirious Manhattan beauty salons. But tastes are differ. Still, its very decent nice perfume for this not expensive price. Why not?
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: SMELT OLD
customer_reviews.text: I'M A CLINUQUE LOVER AND I OPENED THIS TO FIND THAT IT HAD A SMELL TO IT LIKE THE SHELF LIFE WAS GOING BAD. I THOUGHT IT WAS JUST ME, BUT MY DAUGHTER LOVES TO WEAR IT AND SHE TRIED TAKING SOME AND SHE EVEN SAID THAT IT HAD THE SMELL NOW ONCE ITS ON IT TENDS TO WEAR DOWN AN YOU DONT SMELL IT BUT RIGHT OUT OF THE BOTTLE WAS A VERY UNPLEASANT KIND OF SMELL.
customer_reviews.author: jamie swaffar

customer_reviews.title: I give up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this perfume from different amazon sellers only to find that the quality is not up to par. Smell vanishes in minutes... I got my money back but I truly hope that amazon gets better quality control and gets rid of these watered down items. I will be shopping at the malls for perfumes from now on.
customer_reviews.author: MrsNolaf

customer_reviews.title: Why even make a bottle that small?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not really knowing just how small the bottle would be. I almost laughed when I opened the box b/c it literally looked like all I got was a box full of bubble wrap. The bottle was smaller than a tube of lipstick and it was not in any kind of wrapper. The scent itself was as expected. I ended up giving to a friend - she even chuckled and asked where I found a bottle so small. Not a good purchase for the money and it was a big waste on shipping materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brinson

customer_reviews.title: This perfume was old, it did not smell the ...
customer_reviews.text: This perfume was old, it did not smell the same and the actual perfume was yellow.. It should be clear. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Bottle of UN-Happy :(
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Happy before from here with no issues. This last bottle I purchased doesn’t smell like Happy at all. It smells aweful. I tried to return/replace the item but its ineligible.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rosner

customer_reviews.title: No knock offs here
customer_reviews.text: It's real and that's all that really matters I guess. If you are looking for a soft scent that doesn't over power, Happy is it. My lady doesn't wear parfum to often and she loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: IS this a SAMPLE???
customer_reviews.text: I will never purchase something like this again. this was a joke. got it as a gift, I had no idea this was like a sample the size is way too small. I would of bought a larger bottle for this size. unfortunately I didn't get to return or I would have immediately.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Clinique is giving this away for free!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was on my stepdaughter's Christmas list. I thought it was cute for her purse. I went to the department store to buy her the regular size bottle and guess what they gave me for free - this little .14 oz miniature plus the hand cream. So, I stupidly paid $7 for a free product. Rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy from Myrtle Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great price, authentic clinique product.
customer_reviews.text: I love Happy by clinique and at these prices I can finally afford it again. My sister passed away eight years ago and this was also her favorite fragrance. It brought her right into my home with me all the time. Thank you Amazon for providing quality products at affordable prices. The almost out! I'll be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!!! ⚠️ Buyer Beware 🚫
customer_reviews.text: The scent wasn’t at all what I expected. Smelled similar to the original one but this one had a great deal of alcohol in the fragrance which makes it seem kind of cheap and a bit unpleasant. Won’t be rebuying this item and it’s a little upsetting that it’s also not eligible for return =_=
customer_reviews.author: T&J Halpenny

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you think you're getting the real perfume for half the price, THINK AGAIN!!! This is NOT Happy by Clinique!!! It is either a very weak version or a total knockoff in my opinion after using the the real one for the past 15-20 years. At first I thought it was real because it came in a sealed box with the wrapper over it like in the store. But that is easy enough to copy. I have been using this FAKE Happy for over a year before I finally realized what I had suspected for awhile now. Compare it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny62

customer_reviews.title: I love the fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance!!! It has always been a favorite! However when I received the package about a quarter of the bottle had leaked out. I don't know if it was just a faulty bottle or if it was an issue with the actual packaging. It was exactly what I ordered though and the bottle is not so faulty that I cannot use it so I am happy!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SPLASH OF SCENT FOR SPRING AND SUMMER!
customer_reviews.text: THE VIRUS HAS ME DOWN. BUT I NEVER LEAVE HOME WITH A MASK OF SPRINT OF MY "HAPPY!" BY CLINIQUE. GREAT REMEMBRANCE FROM THE '90'S. LIGHT AND REFRESHING!
customer_reviews.author: BOCA GAL!

customer_reviews.title: Scent does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice and very close to the scent of Happy. The smell does not last long though which was for me the hallmark of this scent. Not saying this is imitation; my own body chemistry may have also changed. Not bad for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J

customer_reviews.title: Happy Smell
customer_reviews.text: I really like Happy perfume. It doesn't have a loud smell. It has a mellow smell. It works for me because I have Asthma and can't wear a lot of perfumes. This one works great.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this for years and I love not having to endure the headache (literally) of going into perfume stores to get it! With this purchase though, I feel like it doesn’t smell the way it’s suppose to smell. I don’t know if it’s old or if it’s not legit “Happy” but something is a little off with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Keck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent for me
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this scent to anyone that likes lighter, cleaner scents. I get a ton of positive feedback when I wear it and it makes me feel cleaner. (even if I haven't showered yet). Good pricing, too. You may want to carry it with you, though, as I tend to need a second dose of it in the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Fulte

customer_reviews.title: Aroma arrived damaged, smells very bad
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fragrance several times, it has a very pleasant smell. But this perfume came with a damaged smell, it does not smell like Happy from Clinique. It smells really bad. Impossible to use it. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Francina Perez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite perfume!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume and the price was awesome compared to the mall prices. It was a gift for helping someone and I am glad it didn’t cost her an arm and a leg. This stuff smells so good and I’ve been wearing it for at least 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Scars

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple, if you smell the fragrance happy then you know it’s fabulous. It’s light it’s soft and it’s a perfume I believe most people could wear easily. The price was very good in fact I almost ordered two
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. H. Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent but it DOESN'T last, even minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so BUMMED! This has been my absolute favorite perfume for so long. I don't know if I received an old bottle or if it was diluted or what but the scent doesn't last even minutes! I can spray a ton and not smell it 5 min later. So DISAPPOINTED because it used to linger and last all day!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in this perfume, not like it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I remember this fragrance growing up as my mother and I would often get free samples of it when Clinique had their special deals to get free samples with a purchase of like $20 or more. Back then it seems like this was more a oranges and fruity fragrance, but now it seems like the frangrance has changed and it is 50% less potent than it was years ago. I won't be buying this again once I use this bottle up (if I ever do) since it doesn't seem to smell great or even stay on long.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this Perfume
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Happy on and off for years and just love the scent - I get lots of compliments on it. Bought this one for my niece and she was thrilled - it's a great gift idea! This is a nice large bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Durham

customer_reviews.title: Smells like rubbing alcohol
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this up today and it smells awful. Smells so much like rubbing alcohol that I could use it for hand sanitizer. IDK if the vendor is shady or what, but this isn't the original scent. I'd return it if the window hadn't already closed.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: box is labeled not for sale. isn't that illegal to sell then?
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly ordered this sample, that is clearly marked not for sale, not realizing it was a sample amount. I am surprised if Amazon condones items being sold which are clearly samples and a very poor value. To make matters worse because it is considered a flammable liquid I am unable to return this. I do not understand why it is safe to send it out but not safe to send it back. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this stuff and the price is amazing it’s usually more in stores
customer_reviews.author: Niquee

customer_reviews.title: Because I'm (Usually) Happy....
customer_reviews.text: Happy is my favorite fragrance but this doesn't seem potent at all. I'm really wondering if it's the real deal. I can barely smell it in the bottle, let alone on my clothes. When I purchase it in the store, I can smell it in my clothes at the end of the day. I'm leery about this purchase and not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jetsetter

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...
customer_reviews.text: This review is not for Happy perfume in general since i LOVE happy. It's just this specific bottle. It does smell expired and has a very strong alchol smell. I don't think its a knock off. But perhaps a bad batch, expired or storee incorrectly. I cannot even use it. Instead of being happy i'm dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Matus

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this perfume at the mall. I thought o would try convenience of ship to home. No good. The bottle I got smells so faint. It is like the perfume was watered down. I will be sending it to critique for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle7

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced sample
customer_reviews.text: This vendor should be ashamed of themselves selling this little sample size bottle for $10. This is a free Sample size. Doesn't quite smell like the real perfume, more like a cheap impression of. Definitely would not recommend this it's OVER priced!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great scent however...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful scent and will accent any woman's beauty however, I am reluctant to order perfume online in the future as I have found that I need to use quite a bit in order to keep the scent going all day.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Tanner

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY IS THE PERFECT TIMELESS SCENT THAT I WILL ALWAYS HAVE AS AN OPTION
customer_reviews.text: This was the very first scent I ever tried. I was in 7th grade and my brother bought it for me as my first real girl “grown up” perfume bottle. I’m 33 now and it’s still to this day only one of two scents I will wear (the other scent I’m obsessed with besides “Happy” is Dolce & Gabana’s “Light Blue”😍). Clinique Happy is timeless and I’ve strictly only ordered it from Amazon for the last 3-4 years. Best prices around! You can’t beat it with a stick! I promise, you’ll be super “Happy”!!😉
customer_reviews.author: Ashley King

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: It is great. Smells exactly like it should. However I do feel it doesn't last as long..maybe it's all in my head, but after a couple hours the smell is gone already. But smells just like Happy and I believe it is the actual product. Not sure why it doesn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McEwen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell well worth the price will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Tried this new one because its named Happy, lol, do made me happy. Like the smell, good for summer day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering Clinque Happy Heart. Which is what I usually wear. When it came in it was Happy. I nearly just sent it back. But since I am nearly completely out of Happy Heart I decided to give it a try. It smells really nice and fresh! Happy Heart is still my favorite but Happy is a close second.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Riddiough

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Scent, Excellent Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique’s Happy perfume! I frequently receive compliments. Happy is a light and fresh scent perfect for any occasion (including everyday wear). I am thrilled with the price (in store the 3.4oz bottle sells for $69). I will happily order this item again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Leigh

customer_reviews.title: O
customer_reviews.text: ordered one bottle in February and within 45 days sprayer stopped working. Amazon sent a replacement in May and now this one has stopped working. Will not replace or refund. Not even 1/4 of the bottle used. Definitely will NOT buy again through Amazon. If it was purchased at a local store front they would replace the item regardless of the time frame....update...after speaking with customer service they refunded but still there is an obvious issue with this product
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and there were a lot of dissatisfied customers about the quality of the scent, and I crossed my fingers and was hoping I would get a good one, BUT DID NOT!!! MINE DID COME FROM SWITZERLAND IF THAT DOES MAKE A DIFFERENCE. Not sure how you can check that before hand. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume. It is a little strong during the application, but the scent lasts all day long. I get a lot of compliments ts on this perfume. Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Brett T.

customer_reviews.title: So teenie-tiny!
customer_reviews.text: When they say miniature - they aren't kidding! I was surprised how small the bottle was, however it works perfectly for me - in my gym bag. The scent is perfect, so a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: toupeesmom

customer_reviews.title: 100% counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This product is 100% a counterfeit, I’ve been using this perfume for 15 years, and this is water with a tiny bit of some weird fragrance. I’m not sure how amazon allows these type of products to be sold in here. As a costumer I feel extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Delightful long lasting scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent. Have been using it 30 plus years. Has fresh clean scent & can be used in all seasons. Always receive complements when I wear Happy. 3.4oz last me about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Em Ay

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have Happy
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Happy. It’s a classic, timeless scent. Packaged and shipped with care when delivered. I look forward to using it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlei

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the previous reviews that were posted. The aroma is lovely, however it doesn't last at all. Not a good perfume. Waste of money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance of the Gods
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this fragrance. Wonderful floral fragrance that last all day and I mean all day. I have never met a person this doesn’t smell amazing on. I love the Happy for men but I use the women’s because it lasts longer. Just a warning for any manly men the women’s is a much sweeter fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Malachi C.

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Clinique Happy! Very pleased with this perfume!
customer_reviews.text: I disagree with the negative reviews of this product. I've worn this exact perfume bought from Macy's and there is no difference in the one purchased from Amazon. At least in my order. The product lasts all day...Smells just as the scent should. Great purchase all around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NO T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it thought it would be safe to buy since Amazon sale and ship. This is fake! I should have read the reviews. It's stinky as hell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keren A

customer_reviews.title: Perfume
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume it smell great 👌😍 l have people tell me that you smell good or that perfume light up the room .that how good it smell. Okay thank you very much.💓🥰
customer_reviews.author: Eva J.

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the fresh, long-lasting scent of Happy by Clinique for Women. Amazon, once again, had the best price for this product and the product was exactly as advertised. As usual, the delivery was sufficiently fast for the price I paid (free delivery). I love that Amazon tells you exactly when it will arrive. I use Amazon quite frequently because they have the products I like for the price I want. Summary: I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Buy this perfume if you want a reasonably priced perfume that won't break the bank and will provide compliments from those around you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: So cheap for the amount. Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume ever!!! It’s clean fresh a little citrus. A little floral. I love this and have loved it for 20+ years. The only perfume I wear. And this price is unbelievable!! Soooo cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent, always bringing positive comments from others. Not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cologne. I prefer this original scent to Clinique’s newer scents.Bought it as a gift for me. A little pricey, but definitely worth the cost .
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell like Happy Perfume
customer_reviews.text: I have been using happy by Clinique for over 20 years and never had it smell like this bottle. It is a faint smell and doesn’t smell like happy at all. I opened put with my other perfumes and discarded the box. The first time I sprayed it I knew something was wrong. Seems like it was replaced with water or possibly not from Clinique or maybe just very very old
customer_reviews.author: b colucci-robles

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT. AMAZON SHOULD BE ASHAMED
customer_reviews.text: This is not Clinique Happy. It is fake. I am EXTREMELY UNHAPPY that I threw away money on this sham. Can't return it either!! BAD
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for over 20 years!
customer_reviews.text: Still my favorite perfume for 20 years now! I always get compliments on this from other patients. It’s a lighter scent so it doesn’t gag them when I’m working on their teeth. The scent makes me feel happier!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Happy for decades and LOVE the scent! This is either not the real deal or some strange reformulization. My suspicion, based on other unhappy reviews is that is it likely not the real dea. IT IS NOT RETURNABLE, either. Mine arrived significantly chipped and the bottle was covered in perfume and wet. I find the scent to be strange and weak and I will not wear it. It's going to the dump. A WASTE OF MONEY. Buy from Clinique or Macy's, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: paintedhill

customer_reviews.title: LoVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I havent seen this since like middle school and it smells soooo good im so glad i bought it!!! people keep asking me what are you wearing and im like ohhhh it the old clinique that came out when we were in middle school lol smells great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeniece Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this perfume for awhile and needed some more, great value on Amazon and scent was exactly what I’ve bought at department stores.
customer_reviews.author: StefanieTyler

customer_reviews.title: Product was skunked and unusable!
customer_reviews.text: This product was "skunked" and smells horrible. I've worn Happy for over 15 years. I ordered as my other bottle was running out and when I opened it and tried to use it, the smell was that skunky old perfume smell that smells nothing like the lovely fragrance that Happy is supposed to be. I got right online to return it and it says it is unreturnable . . . so I'm stuck with an expensive 3.4ounce bottle of perfume that is unusable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Baylor-Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I smell good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing happy since I was 18, I’m 38 now. I absolutely love it! I don’t think mine is fake and I have zero issues. Extremely happy. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite perfume of all
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume of all! Subtle but not too subtle. Strong but not too strong. It's a nice fresh scent!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my wife's favorite perfumes. She saw it at a beauty supply store and asked me to get it as a Christmas gift for her. They wanted $75 for it. She's happy with the gift, I'm happy with the price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Amstutz

customer_reviews.title: Iv alwayse been in love with this perfume
customer_reviews.text: Iv alwayse been in love with this perfume. Its nice u dont have to be rich to be able to wear it once in awhile. These little cheap minis make iit easier for us poor mothers of babies to experience the sensational scent without putting a hole in our pockets and THAT is why i gave it the four stars..... its missing one ONLY because the perfume did seem a little diluted compared to bottles purchased from Boston Store, you can tell the scent does not last as long. Still nice smell, havnt wore it since High school and it was a favorite have to have perfume back then. HAPPY memories :)
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This has become my absolute favorite perfume. I get great compliments. The scent lasts. If you like a light floral scent then this is the way to go. A bottle lasts a long time because you don't need to use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume!
customer_reviews.text: Love this smell so much. The best perfume. It also last a long time with two sprays I smell it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Strang

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have wore Clinque Happy for years. Alway had many compliments. Not anymore. It does not have the scent anymore. No fragrance. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, big bottle, great deal that used to cost twice as much, smells incredibly sweet, fresh & citrus crisp.
customer_reviews.author: V1776

customer_reviews.title: Decent smell
customer_reviews.text: Overall a 3star. Smell is not too strong, nice when wore. Only problem is it doesnt stay for long. Guess it depends on body to body
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY PERFUME - good price and delivered quickly! Love Prime! I am "HAPPY".
customer_reviews.author: P. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Happy perfume
customer_reviews.text: This perfume lasts all day long! Citrus and flowers for a great spring to summer scent. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aida M.

customer_reviews.title: Old product
customer_reviews.text: This perfume that I Received has lost its smell . I have been wearing it for years I also use the cream so I know when it has turned rancid. And the worst part is I’m now out the money because a non returnable item .
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: What a Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was such an awesome buy!!! You get so much for your money!! I love the smell of HAPPY!! It makes me HAPPY :) and so does the price :) Bonus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sands

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, clean fragrance that lasts all day! Great price too! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A refreshing, clean fragrance of citrus. I spritz some in my hair after washing it and it lasts until I shampoo my hair again. Long lasting on skin too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: junipers

customer_reviews.title: Old bottle or fake? Who knows!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Clinique Happy for years and to say this purchase was disappointing is an understatement. This is either an extremely old bottle or a counterfeit because it smells nothing like it should. I thought the price was too good to be true for the size of the bottle but I’m going to go out on a limb and say that it’s fake. Now I’m curious as to what I’ve actually sprayed on my body.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P.

product_meta.title: Happy By Clinique For Women, EDP, 3.4 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Size:3.4 Fl OzIntroduced in 1997. Fragrance notes: a floral, citrusy bouquet. Recommended use: daytime. When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
